trans-unit.source: Defines methods for objects that are managed by the hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: Define métodos para objetos que são gerenciados pelo ambiente de hospedagem.

trans-unit.source: Objects must implement the IRegisteredObject interface in order to register with the hosting environment and have their lifetime managed by the hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: Objetos devem implementar a interface IRegisteredObject para registrar com o ambiente de hospedagem e ter seu tempo de vida gerenciado pelo ambiente de hospedagem.

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of a registered object by calling the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the application manager.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar uma instância de um objeto registrado chamando o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método no Gerenciador de aplicativo.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The application manager returns the newly created object to the caller, which can then call a type-specific method on the object.
trans-unit.target: O Gerenciador de aplicativo retorna o objeto recém-criado para o chamador, que pode, em seguida, chamar um método de tipo específico no objeto.

trans-unit.source: During startup, the registered object should call the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to complete registration of the object.
trans-unit.target: Durante a inicialização, o objeto registrado deve chamar o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para concluir o registro do objeto.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the application manager needs to stop a registered object, it will call the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Gerenciador de aplicativos precisa parar um objeto registrado, ele chamará o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications can have only one instance of a registered type.
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos podem ter apenas uma instância de um tipo registrado.

trans-unit.source: To create multiple instances of a registered type, use the factory pattern to create an object manager that is registered with the application and then manages the multiple instances.
trans-unit.target: Para criar várias instâncias de um tipo registrado, use o padrão de fábrica para criar um objeto Gerenciador que está registrado com o aplicativo e, em seguida, gerencia as várias instâncias.

trans-unit.source: For an example of an object implementing the factory pattern, see the example for the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de um objeto que implementa o padrão de fábrica, consulte o exemplo para a <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>classe.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>

trans-unit.source: Requests a registered object to unregister.
trans-unit.target: Solicita um objeto registrado para cancelar o registro.

trans-unit.source: The application manager will call the Stop method to ask a registered object to unregister.
trans-unit.target: O Gerenciador de aplicativos chamará o método de parada para solicitar um objeto registrado para cancelar o registro.

trans-unit.source: During processing of the Stop method, the registered object must call the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Durante o processamento do método de parada, o objeto registrado deve chamar o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Stop method is first called with the `immediate` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: O método de parada é chamado primeiro com o `immediate` parâmetro definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: The object can either complete processing, call the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A> method, and then return or it can return immediately and complete processing asynchronously before calling the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O objeto pode ou concluir o processamento, chame o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A>método e, em seguida, retorno ou retornar imediatamente e concluir o processamento de forma assíncrona antes de chamar o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the registered object does not complete processing before the application manager's time-out period expires, the Stop method is called again with the `immediate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto registrado não for concluída antes de expira o período de tempo limite do Gerenciador de aplicativos de processamento, o método de parada é chamado novamente com o `immediate` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: When the `immediate` parameter is `true`, the registered object must call the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A> method before returning; otherwise, its registration will be removed by the application manager.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `immediate` parâmetro é `true`, objeto registrado deve chamar o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A>método antes de retornar; caso contrário, seu registro será removido pelo Gerenciador de aplicativo.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the registered object should unregister from the hosting environment before returning; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar o objeto registrado deve cancelar o registro do ambiente de hospedagem antes de retornar; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
